name: Fly Futuristic Car In Air
description:
You can play this game on iphon as well as ipad. This games has good controls so you can fell your device as a mini play station.
This best free Fly Futuristic Car In Air game is dual control driving and flying, you can improve you driving as well as flying skills by playing this game.
Your aim is to be a pilot as well as a car driver, just go ahead dodging cars. You can even use nitro boost in this Fly Futuristic Car In Air game to boost the speed.

Fly Futuristic Car In Air:Features

Eye catching awesome Graphics
Very big city environment
Fun, real and intuitive car driving and flying controls
Easy and Free to use
No WiFi? No Problem.
Offline Play.
